solution_line_template: Lucas has a total of {existing_pet_beds} existing pet beds + {new_pet_beds} new pet beds = <<{existing_pet_beds}+{new_pet_beds}={total_pet_beds}>>{total_pet_beds} pet beds.
So according to his parents, Lucas has enough room for {total_pet_beds} pet beds / {beds_per_pet} pet beds per pet = <<{total_pet_beds}/{beds_per_pet}={pets_room_for}>>{pets_room_for} pets.
